I kind of think it's a bit of a problem when you look at a ban request, and it doesn't have nearly enough evidence, like about 1 damage log of one team kill. Most of those I'm not sure whether to ban them or not, so I just leave them for someone else to do it. Of course, they get banned. I say that we have to make it so you have to have multiple damage logs just to even get it considered as long as it isn't "___ killed 5 innocents in 1 round", as we'd obviously accept that.

Example:  http://nonerdsjustgeeks.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=122&t=4024
I think we should just have guidelines for US to decide whats ban worthy and whats not.
Can we require the postround scores too? It would make it so much easier to find out how many kills the "rdmer" got.
